page.title: 10 The Mistley Carnival
page.content: On Saturday it was the Mistley and Manningtree{carnival.}We have a carnival every year in Mistley around the end of April. When it came we walked along with it. The{entertainment}was a cowboy {float}and some of the cowboys were walking beside the float. They had guns with caps in. They made an awful noise. Then we saw the Mistley carnival princess and{carnival queen. We saw Great Bromley carnival queen who came along to help. We saw the Mistley hockey team and the men majorettes. The Thursday Club did a float called the captains table. Then we went to the welcome home field in Mistley where Mistley quay won the tug of war. My dad was the referee.
